snippet.title: Just Cause 4: Danger Rising Trailer
snippet.description:
Get Ready for one last fight 💥

Danger Rising will be available August 29th to Gold Edition and Expansion Pass Owners 🥇 Everyone else: 5 September 2019 🌍In Danger Rising, Rico vows to take down the Agency after learning of their plans to eliminate him. Tom Sheldon joins Rico on his mission to stop the Agency with the all new game-changing Hoverboard and gravity-defying The Stormalong EM Zero – a gravity gun that significantly upgrades Rico’s arsenal!

Just Cause 4 is available NOW on Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC (Steam). Buy here: https://justcause.square-enix-games.com/en-us/buy-now

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Be sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel for further updates on Just Cause 4: http://sqex.link/JCSubscribe
